name: Containment (itch) (Script Kitty)
description:
Containment is an exploration of toxic masculinity through game design.

This was my senior project and my first real game outside of processing. I don't know if i'm going to keep working on it, but here it is. Right now its for PC only, but mac version is coming soon probably.

Created in the LOVE2D engine

"A" = X

"B" = Z
